query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK,'' AS FLAG , A.PSPID, B.BSTNK, C.KUNNR, C.KUNNR_NM AS KUNNRNM, C.VDATU, A.DEPT, A.TEAM, 'ªÁ¿¸∞Ë»π' AS PLAN,
(SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.TEMNO = A.PERSON_NM) AS PERSON_NM,
A.MAKE_MM, D.CONTENT,
A.WAERK, A.ERNAM, VALUE((SELECT ST.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ST.USERNUMB = A.ERNAM), '') AS ERNAMNM, A.ERDAT, A.AEUSN, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(D.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR, A.TYPE, substr(#MAKF_DTT#,1,6) as MAKF_DTT, A.ACTION, A.BIGO1,
A.EXAM, A.GUBUN, A.RATE_L
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0403 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.ZZPJT_ID = C.POSID
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0404 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.MAKE_MM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#MAKF_DT#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#MAKT_DT#,1,6)
--AND B.VKBUR = #VKBUR# AND A.DEPT = #VKBUR#
--AND B.VKGRP = #VKGRP# AND A.TEAM = #VKGRP#
AND A.EXAM = #EXAM#
AND A.GUBUN = #GUBUN#
